data.comment: The match has started, with Sao Paulo kicking-off.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 4, Goianiense GO's Ze Roberto misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 5, Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo's Vitor Bueno is on target but unsuccessful.
Gabriel of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 11, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Sao Paulo's area.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Goianiense GO.
In Sao Paulo Goianiense GO's Ze Roberto is caught offside.
Janderson Santos de Souza (Goianiense GO) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 18, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 20, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 21, Reinaldo (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 24, Sao Paulo push upfield and Brenner gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Goianiense GO defence.
Sao Paulo's Brenner is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 28, Igor Gomes for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, In Sao Paulo Goianiense GO attack through Chico. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Juanfran is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Morumbí.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 32, Juanfran (Sao Paulo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Igor Vinicius.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Goianiense GO.
Gabriel (Sao Paulo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 36, Free kick Goianiense GO.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gilvan (Goianiense GO) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Sao Paulo's Brenner breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Sao Paulo!
Gilvan is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 42, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Gomes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 43, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
In the minute 45, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
At Morumbí the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
The first half has been concluded at Morumbí.
In the minute 45, Brenner puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Sao Paulo - Goianiense GO with the kick-off.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Sao Paulo.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 47, Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Marlon Freitas's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 47, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Sao Paulo attack but Vitor Bueno's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 60, Igor Gomes (Sao Paulo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Matheus Vargas is replacing Gustavo Ferrareis for the away team.
In the minute 60, Vagner Mancini is making the team's second substitution at Morumbí with Hyuri replacing Ze Roberto.
Sao Paulo push forward at Morumbí and Brenner gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
The away team replace Janderson Santos de Souza with Matheuzinho.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Goianiense GO drive forward through Hyuri. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 64, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Matheus Vargas gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Gabriel extends Sao Paulo's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Vitor Bueno (Sao Paulo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Goianiense GO defenders.
Chico for Goianiense GO drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tiago Volpi for Sao Paulo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Wellington Rato is on a sub for Chico for Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO make their fifth substitution with Willian Maranhao replacing Lucas Oliveira.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 70, Tche Tche is on a sub for Vitor Bueno for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 71, Great finish from Brenner to give Sao Paulo a 3-0 lead.
Great play from Gabriel to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Tiago Volpi is back in action after a slight knock.
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Brenner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
In the minute 74, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Diego's header is off-target for Sao Paulo.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Morumbí.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Willian Maranhao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 78, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Gabriel (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 80, Important block from the Goianiense GO defence as Dani Alves fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo make their third substitution with Pablo Felipe replacing Brenner.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 81, Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Matheus Vargas for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 84, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Matheus Vargas of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 85, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Matheuzinho of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Wellington Rato gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade blows against Goianiense GO's Dudu for offside.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
Hyuri (Goianiense GO) has received a first yellow card.
